title: You Are My Sunshine
short_plot_summary: A person expresses their love and devotion to someone, who brings joy and happiness, like sunshine on a cloudy day.
explanation: Sunshine, symbolizing the happiness and joy the person brings
A yellow heart, representing love and the bright, cheerful emotions
A smiling face, illustrating the happiness conveyed in the song
A guitar, indicating the musical instrument often used in country and folk music
Musical notes, representing the melody and the song itself
